CAPTION FIG1.png: 'Figure 1: Scatterplots revealing a lack of association between the number of analogies proposed by a particular participant and the proportion of complete analogies within such participant’s production. Panels (a) and (b) correspond to the non-hinted and the hinted conditions of experiment 1, respectively.\n\n'
